subtitle: This recipe uses ready-made vol-au-vent cases and ready cooked seafood cocktail, making this an easy treat to offer your guests.

method.text: Place the vol-au-vent cases on a lightly greased baking tray. Brush with the beaten egg. Cook according to pack instructions until well risen, crisp and golden brown.
Meanwhile, in a bowl, mix together the avocado pieces and lemon juice. Toss until well coated.
Remove avocado from the lemon juice. Gently mix into the seafood. Stir the mayoonaise, seasoning and curry paste into the lemon juice. Mix well. Stir into the seafood mixture to coat evenly.
Remove the vol au vents from the oven. Leave to cool completely. Remove the pastry lids form the centre and discard. Spoon in the filling. Garnish each with a small sprig of fresh dill.

title: Avocado seafood vol-au-vents
